title: health endpoint returns healthy status
description: Verify that the GET /health endpoint returns a response with status 'healthy' indicating the system is operational.

title: create session with valid pid and cwd
description: Test the POST /session/create endpoint by providing valid pid and cwd in the request body and verify that a new session is created with a session_id and status 'success'.

title: list all active sessions
description: Verify that the GET /session/list endpoint returns a list of all active sessions in the response.

title: command suggestion returns command with safety details
description: Test the POST /command/suggest endpoint by sending a natural language query and session_id, and verify that the response includes a suggested command, safety level indicator, safety reason, and status 'success'.

title: chat endpoint returns ai conversational response
description: Verify that the POST /chat endpoint accepts a session_id and message, and returns a conversational AI response with status 'success'.

title: diagnostics endpoint returns provider connectivity and sessions info
description: Test the GET /diagnostics endpoint to ensure it returns detailed information about AI providers, connectivity status, and session statistics.
